name: Let's Sell Guns - Demo
description:
Hello and welcome to the start of your gun-running empire... This is a WIP small game where you buy and sell guns. Criminals come in and request a specific item, you can either sell it to them or refuse.

I hope you enjoy peeps.

As you wait for someone to come in you can purchase guns from the black market.

All purchases are final and are on the left-hand side marked orders, click those to collect.

If you don't have the requested weapon, either purchase it or refuse.

Above the fridge you can...

 save & continue

 save & exit

reset data to default.

TIP: Recommended to buy guns as they are requested until you've acquired enough funds.

TIP: Compare prices before selling weapons to see if you make a profit from the base price.

Features

  • Buy & sell guns to criminals.
  • Enjoy some great jams by David KBD.
  • Manage deals as you make your way to the richest gunrunner ever.

Controls

  • Everything is controlled via the glorious LMB.
  • The Record Player controls the music player.
  • The open book on the gun table controls the gun market.
  • I key - Open/Close inventory.

More To Come

More to come as i gather feedback on the current state of the game. So stay tuned peeps.

  • A few more criminals, weaponry & maybe a few side items.
  • A story to repay a debt [maybe]?
  • Take out loans.
  • Pets!
  • Better Menus!
  • A Main menu!
  • Skip Tracks!
  • & Maybe a little more!

Credits

  • Characters - Craftpix
